description: MEMORANDUM AND OPINION ORDERING THAT BARINGER'S MOTION FOR JUDGMENT AS A MATTER OF LAW (DOCKET NO. 256) IS DENIED. BARINGER'S MOTION FOR RELIEF FROM THE JUDGMENT PURSUANT TO RULE 60(b)(6) (DOCKET NO. 256) IS DENIED. BARINGER'S MOTION T O ALTER OR AMEND THE JUDGMENT PURSUANT TO RULES 59(e) AND 60(b)(5) (DOCKET NO. 256) IS DENIED. BARINGER'S MOTION FOR A NEW TRIAL PURSUANT TO RULE 59 (DOCKET NO. 256) IS DENIED. THE CLERK OF THE COURT SHALL MARK THIS CASE CLOSED FOR STATISTICAL AND ALL OTHER PURPOSES. SIGNED BY JUDGE GENE E.K. PRATTER ON 08/31/2007. 08/31/2007 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED AND E-MAILED.
